title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2391/95 of 11 October 1995 amending Regulation (EC) No 1098/94 laying down the regional base areas applicable under the arable support system for producers
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2391/95 of 11 October 1995 amending Regulation (EC) No  1098/94 laying down the regional base areas applicable under the arable support system for  producers
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in  the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 October 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
